snippet: Secretary of State John Kerry made it clear that he would welcome expanded cooperation with Russia after a meeting in Paris with the country’s foreign minister.
abstract: Sec of State John Kerry announces agreement with Russia to share more intelligence on the Islamic State; agreement is part of effort by Kerry to lay basis for improved cooperation between the two nations, significant shift from Obama administration's effort to isolate Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin only six months earlier.
lead_paragraph: Secretary of State John Kerry made it clear that he would welcome expanded cooperation with Russia after a meeting in Paris with the country’s foreign minister.

headline.main: U.S. and Russia Agree to Share More Intelligence on ISIS
headline.print_headline: U.S. and Russia Agree to Share More Intelligence on Islamic State

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
